Slugslinger also begins to sputter, his engines not roaring anymore.
"What's going on?" Caliburst asked nervously notting the energy meters
dropping. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Inside Spinister looks around at the stumbling troops, then to Havotron
for Direction.

Nightmare tries his best not to falter, and stay at his ready position
next to Havotron, like a model soldier. Jagged however stumbles, and
then trips over Apeface as he lands face first, in stasis lock.

Apeface also falls over, trying to grab something to stabalize, but
fails as he falls onto his back, transforming to ape mode, as his head
detaches, and transforms into a little robot, backflipping and landing.
Spasma then turns towards the post Hook left empty. As a scientist he
was over curious at what was happening. He leapt up onto the chair, but
since he couldnt see, he then leapt to the consol, and looked at the
readings. "Sir, this isn't good, as it is our ship may stall, in
outerspace." He says in a worried tone.
